title: 297. YENA A TIYIMISELE KU NDZI FELA

lines: THERE WAS ONE WHO WAS WILLING
1. Yena A Tiyimisele Ku Ndzi Fela, Leswaku Mina Ndzi Ta Hanya,
U Yi Fambile Ndlela Ya Xihambano, Ku Hlantswa Swidyoho Swa Mina.
Swi Beleriwile Exihambanweni, U Herise Swidyoho Swanga,
Hi Gome Yesu U Fe Xihambanweni, U Fele Swidyoho Swa Mina.
2. U Ndzi Lehisela Mbilu Hi Rirhandzu, Loko A Ndzi Basisa Mbilu,
U Surile Nandzu, Se Ndzi Ntshuxiwile, U Susile Swidyoho Swanga.
3. Masiku Hinkwawo Ndzi Ta Namarhela, Ndzi Nge Ku Siyi Muponisi,
Hi Nomu Ni Mbilu Ndzi Ta Yimbelela, U Rhwarile Swidyoho Swanga.
